page.title: 09Recreation in Sydling
page.content: At the moment we do not have a Youth Club in Sydling. Last year it was a thriving concern so no doubt it will start up again when the need is there. The village hall is well used by the villagers for dances. discos, parties, Harvest Supper, weddings and birthdays. Playgroup for the under fives is held in the hall 2 mornings a week. The Womens Institute meetings are also in the hall, also a dressmaking class, keep fit and badmington. The Summer Fete is held once a year at the Court House and is always well attended. It raises a goodly sum of money for the Church and the village hall.
